verses.roman:
ei-mata mahāprabhu rātri-divase
prema-sindhu-magna rahe, kabhu ḍube, bhāse

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; rātri-divase—day and night; prema-sindhu-magna rahe—remains merged in the ocean of love of Kṛṣṇa; kabhu ḍube—sometimes drowns; bhāse—floats.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu in this way stayed immersed day and night in an ocean of ecstatic love for Kṛṣṇa. Sometimes He was submerged, and sometimes He floated.
